sqlMap.select: SELECT * ,(SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1) AS inputername ,(SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1) AS updatername FROM api_cosco_port t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM api_cosco_port s WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE

SELECT * ,(SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.inputer and x.isdelete = false limit 1) AS inputername ,(SELECT x.namec FROM sys_user x where x.code = t.updater and x.isdelete = false limit 1) AS updatername FROM api_cosco_bookingdata t WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM api_cosco_bookingdata s WHERE $qry$ AND isdelete = FALSE
